events.comment: Make sure to include this eventsheet in your zone event sheet

sub-events.comment: Stuff for having end text move in as well as having Sonic be forced to go right
Once player's X position is greater than the EndPost's X position, the end panel will spin
Once the endpanel spins the player will automatically walk right

Once the player leaves the screen the end text comes in. Note: don't put a large slope that goes up at the end, as Sonic will have to walk up it, and it'll probably take awhile for him to get up and the stage will only end once he leaves the screen
Test Zone Act 1 to Test Zone Act 2
